parameters.name: LastTime
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the logs of the previous container if the container exits and restarts. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: LimitBytes
parameters.description: The limit on the total size of logs. Unit: bytes. Valid values: 1 to 1048576(1 MB).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the elastic container instance.

parameters.name: SinceSeconds
parameters.description: A relative time in seconds before the current time from which to show logs. Examples: 10, 20, and 30.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the RFC 3339 standard. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Tail
parameters.description: The number of log entries that you want to query. Default value: 500. Maximum value: 2000. A maximum of 1 MB of logs can be returned.

parameters.name: Timestamps
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the timestamps of logs. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.
